divs: Sighting DetailsI awoke to find myself panicked, trying to get the bathroom light on whilefacing into my bedroom.there was an object floating outside my bedroom window.it had 4 colored lights on it and was a sphere.the lights divided it into 4separate colors like a simon game i had when i was a kid.suddenly i heard goback to bed and as i walked back into my room, the object went over the top ofthe house and came down outside my sons window.i went back to bed and did noteven wake my husband. i do not remember anything after that.
